thread.title: Without a pass rush we have managed to break 3/5 of the quarterbacks we have faced
thread.title_full: Without a pass rush we have managed to break 3/5 of the quarterbacks we have faced

author: splitsecond
title: Without a pass rush we have managed to break 3/5 of the quarterbacks we have faced
text: Location: Casa Grande, AZ Posts: 3,735 Without a pass rush we have managed to break 3/5 of the quarterbacks we have faced Think about this. We have literally broken 3 of the quarterbacks we have faced even with no real edge rushers. Cutler Kaepernick Stafford These are all guys who have heir weaknesses but they are also all guys who have been highly regarded at one point or another. And we have broken them all like their names were Delhome Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk Well the tests will only get tougher. The easy part of our schedule is over. Okay maybe not completely with the Ravens and Browns on deck after Pittsburgh but after that it's brutal. GB, SEA x2, Cin, @STl, @PHI. And it appears without our #1 OLB with the way Arians and our beat writers were talking about the injury situation. We are going to see how this team stacks up against some of the best teams in the league pretty soon here. So far they've done all thats asked of them and gotten the job done. Winning on the road is never easy and we are 2-0. The old Cardinals couldn't do that Beating those guys = Superbowl :laugh: Well the tests will only get tougher. The easy part of our schedule is over. Okay maybe not completely with the Ravens and Browns on deck after Pittsburgh but after that it's brutal. GB, SEA x2, Cin, @STl, @PHI. And it appears without our #1 OLB with the way Arians and our beat writers were talking about the injury situation. We are going to see how this team stacks up against some of the best teams in the league pretty soon here. So far they've done all thats asked of them and gotten the job done. Winning on the road is never easy and we are 2-0. The old Cardinals couldn't do that especially by a combined score of 90-40.
